Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents

Class MyShelfieButton

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.ButtonBase
javafx.scene.control.Button
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.MyShelfieButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieComponent, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class MyShelfieButton extends javafx.scene.control.Button implements MyShelfieComponent
The MyShelfieButton class represents a customized button in the MyShelfie GUI. It extends the Button class from JavaFX and implements the MyShelfieComponent interface. The class provides various customization options for the button's appearance and behavior.
Since:
08/06/2023
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • MyShelfieButton

      public MyShelfieButton(String text, boolean rounded, MyShelfieRoundEdgeType radius, String iconName)

      Construct a "MyShelfieButton" with personalization set as specified by parameters

      Parameters:
      text - the text to show in the button
      rounded - boolean value that determinate if the button has to be rounded (true) or not (false)
      radius - the radius-edge value chosen between the different available values
      iconName - the name of the file that corresponds to the icon that the button should have, followed by the extension of the file itself
      See Also:
      • MyShelfieRoundEdge
      • MyShelfieRoundEdgeType

    • MyShelfieButton

      public MyShelfieButton(String text, boolean rounded)

      Construct a "MyShelfieButton" with personalization set as specified by parameters

      Parameters:
      text - the text to shown in the button
      rounded - boolean value that determinate if the button has to be rounded (true) or not (false)

      Parameters:
      text - the text to show in the button
      iconName - the name of the file that corresponds to the icon that the button should have, followed by the extension of the file itself
